pageContent: Background: Both docetaxel and androgen-receptor-axis-targeted (ARAT) agents are approved in metastatic castration-sensitive prostate cancer (mCSPC) patients. Predictive factors of therapy efficacy are lacking.

metaData.source:
Piloting prostate cancer patient-reported outcomesin clinical practice
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26498748/
